statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_id, key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'Master%';
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%encryption%';
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT COUNT(key_id) AS total_keys FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM key_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM key_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin' ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys JOIN key_permissions ON encryption_keys.id = key_permissions.key_id WHERE key_name LIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY key_permissions.user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM key_permissions;
SELECT key_name, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'master_key';
SELECT key_id, user_id, permission_level FROM key_permissions ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT timestamp, action FROM key_usage_logs WHERE key_id = 1 AND action = 'encrypt' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, key_id, timestamp FROM key_usage_logs WHERE action = 'decrypt' LIMIT 10;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM key_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin' AND user_id = 12345;
SELECT key_id, action FROM key_usage_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys JOIN key_usage_logs ON encryption_keys.id = key_usage_logs.key_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value, key_owner FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT key_id, key_owner FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_owner DESC;
SELECT AVG(key_id) AS AvgKeyId FROM key_management;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_owner FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_owner='Alice';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, key_id, log_timestamp FROM key_usage_logs WHERE key_id = 7;
SELECT management_id, key_type FROM key_management WHERE key_algorithm='AES';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT key_id, key_description FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT storage_id, data_owner, data_encryptor FROM data_storage WHERE data_encryptor = 'c0b55607-932b-49e9-8453-409b5ed4f169';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT data_owner, encryptor_id, encrypted_data FROM data_storage WHERE data_owner = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, password_hash, users.user_id, log_timestamp, action FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id;
